name: Ranch Tycoon
description:
Ranch Tycoon is a simulation game heavly focused in building a farm and trying to automate it.

Stardew Valey meets factorio with 3D graphics.

Features:

  • Building
  • Weather system
  • Creating and harvesting crops
  • Buy and selling products
  • Tech tree with tiers to unlock
  • Water management

Incoming features:

  • Power System
  • Customizable buildings
  • Land expansion
  • Hazards/Enemies
  • Advanced skill tree
  • Pause system
  • Save/Load game

Developer: Diogo Ferreira

3D Artist (Freelancer): Rafael Marques
